CVE.summary: The make_indexed_dir function in fs/ext4/namei.c in the Linux kernel 2.6.27 before 2.6.27.19 and 2.6.28 before 2.6.28.7 does not validate a certain rec_len field, which allows local users to cause a denial of service (OOPS) by attempting to mount a crafted ext4 filesystem.

vFeed.Author: NJ OUCHN

Oval.title: DSA-1749-1 linux-2.6 -- denial of service/privilege escalation/sensitive memory leak
ELSA-2009:1243: Oracle Linux 5.x.4 kernel security and bug fix update (Important)
DSA-1749 linux-2.6 -- denial of service/privilege escalation/sensitive memory leak
RHSA-2009:1243 -- Red Hat Enterprise Linux 5.4 kernel security and bug fix update (Important)

The make_indexed_dir function in fs/ext4/namei.c in the Linux kernel 2.6.27 before 2.6.27.19 and 2.6.28 before 2.6.28.7 does not validate a certain rec_len field, which allows local users to cause a denial of service (OOPS) by attempting to mount a crafted ext4 filesystem.
